name: For reply, if toPart elements are used on a reply activity then the variable attribute MUST NOT be used on the same activity.
description: For reply, if toPart elements are used on a reply activity then the variable attribute MUST NOT be used on the same activity.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Compatible with CISQ 18 and especially ASCCSM-CWE-835
remediation: For reply, if toPart elements are used on a reply activity then the variable attribute MUST NOT be used on the same activity.
